description: Minor material amendment (S.73) to vary condition no. 2 (approved plans) pursuant to planning permission reference 204483FUL dated 08/01/2021 for 'Conversion of existing building into 9 self-contained flats and provision of associated cycle parking space; change of use of the ground floor form Restaurant (Use Class E(b)) to Shop (Use Class E(a)); alterations to the ground floor elevations; three storey rear/side extension (to first, second and third floors) (following demolition of existing side/rear addition).' Variation seeks minor alterations to the rear and side elevations at ground floor level and a proposed new shopfront design, relocate the entrance to the commercial and domestic refuse stores and space for storage of cycles for use by tenants of the retail space from the rear of the building to the side, minor changes are requested to the rear elevation; replacement of 1 no. large window with 3 no. smaller windows, omission of 3 no. doors to refuse and cycle storage, installation of a fixed ventilation grille, rebuilding of a boundary wall to the Side Elevation; omission of 1 no. large window, insertion of a new door to access relocated refuse and cycle storage, installation of a fixed ventilation grille, minor modifications to the entrance door design, and to the Front Elevation; replacement with the former restaurant shopfront with a new, fully-glazed retail shopfront.
